Class Vehicle

java.lang.Object
Vehicle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Movable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Car, Carrier
public abstract class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Movable
Parent class, handles all types of cars Implements Movable for movement related issues

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.awt.Color color
    Color of the Vehicle
    protected double currentSpeed
    The current speed of the Vehicle
    protected double[] direction
    The direction the Vehicle is facing Should be initialized with length 1 to keep it that way

    • rotateVector

      protected double[] rotateVector​(double[] vector, double radians)
      Rotate vector A*v = v', where A is the rotation matrix and v is the velocity vector The math: |cos r -sin r| * |dx| = |dx'| |sin r cos r| |dy| |dy'|
      Parameters:
      vector - to be rotated
      radians - how much to rotate
      Returns:
      transformed vector

      upperBound - upper limit
      value - to be checked
      Returns:
      bool
